fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Energy, Environment, Single market, Food Safety, Climate Action
head_office_address: Confederation House, AIC Ltd East of England Showground
eu_initiatives:
Activities falling within the business areas of our membership sectors: Animal Feed Manufacturing & Distribution; Fertiliser Manufacture & Distribution; Arable Crop Marketing, Seed Multiplication, Processing & Distribution; Crop Protection Product Distribution and on-farm Agronomy Advice. 
Interests lie in the areas of Food & Feed Safety, Science & technology/ innovation in agriculture, Commodity Risk Management and Financial Markets legislation, Environmental land management and resource management & protection; GHG reduction and mitigation; Organic production, CAP Reform, Biotechnology; legislative files directly or indirectly applicable to the membership sectors listed above.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
COCERAL - European Association representing the collectors, distributors, exporters, importers and agribulk storers in cereals, rice, feedstuffs, oilseeds, olive oil, oils, fats and agrosupply. 
FEFAC - European Feed Manufacturers Federation 
ESA - European Seed Association 
Fertilisers Europe - representing the European industry manufacturing fertiliser products
goals__remit:
AIC is a trade organisations which exists to serve the interests of its members in the field of agri-supply.  This includes the provision of information to members on new legislative requirements and the representation of their interests in both the UK and EU with national authorities, EU bodies and other industry stakeholders. 
AIC also provides a range of trade assurance schemes for the UK which are independently audited to EN45011 and cover areas of food and feed safety and security (fertilisers)
relevant_communication: AIC runs an annual Conference (Agribusiness) for its members and other stakeholders.  Attendance is UK based with the exception of occasional overseas speakers and representatives from the EU organisations we belong to.
legal_status: A company limited by guarantee and not having a share capital
